title: Calories in a Tic Tac
meta_description: Learn calories in a tic tac, including carbs, sugars, and full nutrition facts for this small mint candy.
assumptions: Standard original Tic Tac mint, ~0.49 g per piece, no added ingredients.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, brand batch, and exact size. Typically very low calorie; check packaging for specifics.

quick_answer.text: A single Tic Tac mint has about 2 calories, mostly from sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with candy packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories in a tic tac?
faqs.a: Approximately 2 kcal per Tic Tac mint.

faqs.q: Are Tic Tacs high in sugar?
faqs.a: One Tic Tac has about 0.4 g of sugars, very low overall.

faqs.q: Do Tic Tacs have any protein or fat?
faqs.a: No significant protein or fat; 0 g in a single piece.

faqs.q: How many Tic Tacs in a serving?
faqs.a: Typical serving is 2-3 pieces, about 4-6 kcal total.
Usually 0 kcal, using artificial sweeteners instead of sugar.
